long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
QR Go lets you follow QR codes from your web browser! QR Go is FREE and does not require extra permissions ğŸ˜Š

With just 2 clicks you can follow any QR code you find on the web.  OR  Pin the extension to your taskbar and with just 1 click you can follow QR codes. It doesnâ€™t get any easier than this!ğŸ˜„

QR Go RESPECTS YOUR PRIVACY!

We do NOT collect your data. We do NOT sell your data. We donâ€™t even track web store installs. Basically, Ben has no idea who you are unless you send an email and say hello. 

No login is required either. Why on this good Earth would someone make you login to be able to follow a QR code in your browser?

Install QR Go from the Chrome Web Store today! And if it helps you make the most of your web browsing, please consider leaving a review in the chrome web store to spread the word. 

QR Go is made by Happy Concepts (Ben Bird). You are most welcome to donate a few dollars to the creator of this extension, but there is no obligation at all.

Now ... GO! GO FIND SOME QR CODES ON THE WEB! ğŸ˜ŠğŸ˜ŠğŸ˜²
